short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily export all employees from your company's keka dashboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Single click to export all the employees details from your company's Keka dashboard into a CSV file. CSV files can be imported into Excel or Google Sheets easily.
